title: Ghost to Ghost Halloween 2004 ghost stories - art bell, spiricom
description:
Coast to Coast AM with Art Bell
2004 Hallowe&#039;en Show, 31 Oct 04.
Running time: 166 minutes, 39 seconds
Format: mp3 and ogg, exported from Audacity 
Recorded in glorious MONO from a crappy AM radio.  

Notes:
This show is called "Ghost to Ghost AM" on Hallowe&#039;en night because the host turns it over to callers with ghost stories.  One of the topics of this show was Spiricom, an attempt to communicate electronically with the dead by George Meek, Bill O&#039;Neill, and an alleged ghost by the name of Doc Mueller.  This research generated controversy but this was its first debut in an (arguably) mainstream radio talk show in the USA.  If you want to know more about Spiricom, the site is www.worlditc.org.  Nowadays, you can check out search terms like "ghost box" or "Frank&#039;s box."

Commercials, station IDs cut.  Everything else is exactly as it was broadcast.

Share and enjoy.

-bleach-
